snippet.title: Ember Sword - Early Pre-Alpha Footage (2020)
snippet.description:
Pre-register: https://EmberSword.com
Ember Sword is an upcoming Free-to-Play fantasy sandbox MMORPG playable directly in your browser or through a desktop client.

This early pre-alpha footage shows off some of Solarwood, one of 4 regions in the world of Thanabus, as well as resource collection and combat. Stay tuned for more detailed videos and screenshots over the coming months.

A huge thanks goes our to our fantastic community (now at over 18k players!) for the amazing support over the past months.

Join the community on Discord to chat with us directly: https://discord.gg/embersword

TWITTER: http://twitter.com/PlayEmberSword
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/PlayEmberSword
REDDIT: http://reddit.com/r/EmberSword

Ember Sword is a modern rewrite of the games industry business model in favor of the user, and a love letter to MMORPG gamers. It's instantly playable, has a classless combat system and a player-controlled world, and NO lootboxes or predatory Pay-to-Win monetization!
